00008 pthread_key_t Thread::m_threadNameKey = 0;
00009 const pthread_t Thread::m_mainThread = pthread_self();

00011 Thread::Thread() :
00012         m_tid(0), m_stackSize(DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE) {
00013 
00014         MT_LOGINIT(Thread);
00015         if (m_threadNameKey == 0)
00016                 pthread_key_create(&m_threadNameKey, &keyDestructor);
00017 
00018         sigemptyset(&m_sigSet);
00019         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGFPE); //Float point exception
00020         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGHUP);
00021         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGPIPE);
00022         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGCLD);
00023         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGALRM);
00024 }
00025 
00026 Thread::Thread(const std::string& name, uint32_t stackSize) :
00027         m_tid(0), m_stackSize(stackSize), m_name(name) {
00028         MT_LOGINIT(Thread);
00029 
00030         sigemptyset(&m_sigSet);
00031         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGFPE); //Float point exception
00032         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGHUP);
00033         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGPIPE);
00034         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGCLD);
00035         sigaddset(&m_sigSet, SIGALRM);
00036 
00037         if (m_threadNameKey == 0)
00038                 pthread_key_create(&m_threadNameKey, &keyDestructor);
00039 }
00040 
00041 Thread::~Thread() {
00042         if (m_tid)
00043                 pthread_detach(m_tid);
00044         stop();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void Thread::start() {
00048         if (isRunning())
00049                 throw mt::ThreadAlreadyRunningException();
00050 
00051         m_tid = createThread(&startable, m_stackSize, this);
00052         if (m_tid == 0) {
00053                 switch (errno) {
00054                 case EAGAIN:
00055                         throw mt::ThreadTooManyThreadsException();
00056                 case EINVAL:
00057                         throw mt::ThreadInvalidArgumentException();
00058                 case ENOMEM:
00059                         throw mt::ThreadNoMemoryException();
00060                 default:
00061                         MT_EXCEPTION(mt::ThreadCantStartException, "Errno=" << errno)
00062                         ;
00063                 }
00064         }
00065 }
00066 
00067 void Thread::stop() {
00068         if (isRunning())
00069                 wait();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void Thread::wait() {
00073         if (isRunning()) {
00074                 checkTid();
00075                 pthread_join(m_tid, NULL);
00076         }
00077 }
00078 
00079 bool Thread::setPriority(int32_t priority) {
00080         checkTid();
00081         struct sched_param param;
00082         param.sched_priority = priority;
00083         return (pthread_setschedparam(m_tid, SCHED_OTHER, &param) != -1);
00084 }
00085 
00086 int32_t Thread::getPriority() {
00087         checkTid();
00088         struct sched_param param;
00089         int policy;
00090         pthread_getschedparam(m_tid, &policy, &param);
00091         return param.sched_priority;
00092 }
00093 
00094 std::string Thread::name() {
00095         if (pthread_self() == m_mainThread)// this is the main() thread
00096                 return "main_thread";
00097         char* name = static_cast<char*> (pthread_getspecific(m_threadNameKey));
00098         if (name == 0 || strlen(name) == 0)
00099                 return "Unknown thread";
00100         else
00101                 return std::string(name);
00102 }
00103 
00104 void Thread::setName(const std::string& name) {
00105         char* buffer = new char[32];
00106         sprintf(buffer, "%.19s(%06d)", name.c_str(), (int32_t) pthread_self());
00107         pthread_setspecific(m_threadNameKey, buffer);
00108 }
00109 
00110 void* Thread::startable(void* thread) {
00111         MT_LOGINIT_STATIC(Thread);
00112 
00113         Thread* this_thread = (Thread*) thread;
00114         this_thread->atThreadStart();
00115 
00116         try {
00117                 this_thread->run();
00118         } catch (const mt::Exception& me) {
00119                 MT_LOGERROR("Stop thread " << (int32_t)this_thread->m_tid << " by error. Reason : " << me.displayText());
00120         } catch (...) {
00121                 MT_LOGERROR("Stop thread " << (int32_t)this_thread->m_tid << " by unhandled exception.");
00122         }
00123         this_thread->atThreadEnd();
00124         return 0;
00125 }
00126 
00127 void Thread::atThreadStart() {
00128         pthread_setspecific(m_threadNameKey, m_name.c_str());
00129         pthread_sigmask(SIG_BLOCK, &m_sigSet, NULL);
00130 
00131         if (m_name.empty())
00132                 setName("mt thread");
00133         else
00134                 setName(m_name);
00135 }
00136 
00137 void Thread::atThreadEnd() {
00138         pthread_exit(0);
00139 }
00140 
00141 bool Thread::isRunning() {
00142         if (m_tid == 0)
00143                 return false;
00144         struct sched_param param;
00145         int policy;
00146         return !(pthread_getschedparam(m_tid, &policy, &param) == ESRCH);
00147 }
00148 
00149 pthread_t Thread::createThread(void* (*threadFunc)(void*), uint32_t stack_size,
00150                 void* params) {
00151         pthread_t ret_val;
00152         int32_t status = 0;
00153         if (stack_size > 0) {
00154                 pthread_attr_t attr;
00155                 pthread_attr_init(&attr);
00156                 pthread_attr_setstacksize(&attr, stack_size);
00157                 status = pthread_create(&ret_val, &attr, (void*(*)(void*)) threadFunc,
00158                                 params);
00159         } else
00160                 status = pthread_create(&ret_val, 0, (void*(*)(void*)) threadFunc,
00161                                 params);
00162 
00163         if (status)
00164                 return 0;
00165         return ret_val;
00166 }
00167 
00168 void Thread::checkTid() {
00169         if (m_tid == 0)
00170                 m_tid = pthread_self();
00171 }
00172 
00173 void Thread::keyDestructor(void* key_value) {
00174         delete[] (char*) key_value;
00175 }
00176 }
